description: Automatically detects hardcoded secrets before git commits. Scans for API keys (AWS: AKIA..., OpenAI: sk-..., Stripe: sk_live_..., Google: AIza..., GitHub: ghp_...), tokens, passwords, private keys, and database credentials. Blocks commits containing secrets and suggests using environment variables instead.

hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_COMMAND" | grep -qE '^git\s+commit'; then python3 "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR"/.claude/hooks/secret-scanner.py 2>&1; fi
